content: in this legal case a marriage between two parties was concluded in 2011 and they were divorced in 2022 they have joint assets including a property that is mortgaged the claimant wants to divide the property either through a public auction or by transferring it to the defendant with compensation the defendant agrees to sell the property through a public auction but also wants to acquire it through a counterclaim the court determines that the joint ownership should be terminated and the property should be sold through a public auction the parties are advised to reach a compromise the court also determines that the defendant should bear the procedural costs the claimant is awarded legal aid costs for the duration of the court hearing which were considered reasonable the total time spent on the hearing was 7 hours and 45 minutes additionally the defendant is ordered to compensate the claimants legal fees in the amount of 50 euros the judgment was partially annulled by the tallinn district court in 2023 a decision was made in a legal case involving two parties but the specific details are not provided
